queue.title: Intro
queue.speech: Hello! I am a robot that will guide you now. When you hear the first chime it’s time to turn on the shower and rinse your body. And when you hear the chimes again you’ve got 10 seconds to turn it back off.

queue.title: Rinse
queue.speech: Okay. It’s time to turn on the water for 45 seconds and rinse.

queue.title: Soap
queue.speech: I hope you managed to rinse, because now it’s time to wash your body with Soap.

queue.title: Rinse
queue.speech: Time to rinse for 90 seconds. Turn the water back on.

queue.title: Dry
queue.speech: Good. Now it’s time to get dry. Hope to meet you soon again!
